alert.note: Alert for Blair; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 5:24PM EDT until July 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Blair and Huntingdon. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall of 1 to 2.5 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Huntingdon, Williamsburg, Canoe Creek State Park, McConnellstown, Petersburg, Alexandria and Juniata College. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
